trans-unit.source: Hosts and navigates between HTML documents.
Enables interoperability between WPF managed code and HTML script.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control provides the following capabilities:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>控制項提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.NavigateToStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.NavigateToString%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **巡覽**： <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.NavigateToStream%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.NavigateToString%2A>和 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Refresh%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Lifetime**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigated>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: **瀏覽存留期**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigating>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigated>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted>。

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Journaling**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **瀏覽日誌**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **WPF/HTML Interoperability**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **WPF/HTML 互通性**:<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Document%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> is bound by the security constraints of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that is hosting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> 繫結的安全性限制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]裝載的應用程式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>:

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> is hosted by a full-trust [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application (a stand-alone application, for example), <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] documents from any location.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>由完全信任[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式 （獨立的應用程式，例如），<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>可以裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> is hosted by a partial-trust [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application (an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], for example), <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> can only host documents that are **Site Of Origin** application data files.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>由部分信任[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式 ( [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]，例如)，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>只能裝載的文件**站台的原點**應用程式資料檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WPF 應用程式資源、內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>控制項在內部具現化的原生 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: WPF 可讓安全性功能，藉由套用到 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項功能的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications.
trans-unit.target: 套用的功能控制項不同 Xbap 和獨立的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running.
trans-unit.target: 某些應用程式應該套用額外的功能以防止執行惡意內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 WebBrowser 控制項和功能控制項 」 一節[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)和[WebBrowser 控制項概觀與教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> to navigate to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by using markup only.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]使用只有標記的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> to navigate to a document by using markup and code-behind.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>瀏覽至文件使用的標記和程式碼後置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the `NewWindow2` event and similar events using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何處理`NewWindow2`事件以及使用的類似事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a reference to **SHDocVw.dll**, a `using System.Runtime.InteropServices;` statement, and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control named `webBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要參考**SHDocVw.dll**、`using System.Runtime.InteropServices;`陳述式，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>控制項，名為`webBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> class.
to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.Safe" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.Safe" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is a document to navigate back to.
A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether there is a document to navigate back to.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />值，指出是否可瀏覽回到文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate back to the previous document by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何巡覽回上一個文件，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example first checks that there are documents to navigate back to by checking <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會先檢查向後巡覽至所檢查的文件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is a document to navigate forward to.
A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether there is a document to navigate forward to.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />值，指出是否可巡覽的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate forward to the next [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何巡覽至下一個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example first checks that there are documents to navigate forward to by checking <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會先檢查是藉由檢查向前巡覽至文件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Document object that represents the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] page.
A Document object.
trans-unit.target: Document 物件。

trans-unit.source: The Document object needs to be cast to the COM interface you are expecting.
trans-unit.target: 文件物件必須轉換成您想要的 COM 介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
to call this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Navigate back to the previous document, if there is one.

If you call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A> and there are not any documents to navigate back to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> does not perform a navigation and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>且沒有任何文件，以瀏覽至，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>不會執行瀏覽並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you need to, you can inspect the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A> property to determine whether there are documents to navigate back to.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要您可以檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>屬性來判斷是否有向後巡覽至文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate back to the previous [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何巡覽回上一個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoBack%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example first checks that there are [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] documents to navigate back to by checking <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會先檢查沒有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件，以瀏覽回藉由檢查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoBack%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
There is no document to navigate back to.
Navigate forward to the next [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document, if there is one.

If you call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A> and there are not any documents to navigate forward to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> does not perform a navigation and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>且沒有任何文件，以向前巡覽，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>不會執行瀏覽並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you need to, you can inspect the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A> property to determine whether there are documents to navigate forward to.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要您可以檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>屬性來判斷是否有可巡覽的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate forward to the next document by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何藉由呼叫向前巡覽至下一個文件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.GoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example first checks that there are documents to navigate forward to by checking <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會先檢查是藉由檢查向前巡覽至文件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.CanGoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
There is no document to navigate forward to.
Executes a scripting function defined in the currently loaded document.
The name of the script function to execute.
Executes a script function that is implemented by the currently loaded document.
The object returned by the Active Scripting call.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%29> should not be called before the document that implements it has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%29> 不應該呼叫之前其實作的文件已完成載入。

trans-unit.source: You can detect when a document has finished loading by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 文件載入處理完成時，您可以偵測<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call a script function in a document from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫從文件中的指令碼函式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the script function has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，指令碼函式沒有任何參數。

trans-unit.source: The following is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document that implements the script function that will be called from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 以下是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]實作將會從呼叫的指令碼函式的文件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] implementation to call the script function in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]呼叫中的指令碼函式實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
The script function does not exist.
The name of the script function to execute.
The parameters to pass to the script function.
Executes a script function that is defined in the currently loaded document.
The object returned by the Active Scripting call.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> should not be called before the document that implements it has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> 不應該呼叫之前其實作的文件已完成載入。

trans-unit.source: You can detect when a document has finished loading by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 文件載入處理完成時，您可以偵測<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.LoadCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not pass enough parameter values to the script that you are invoking, the parameters that you do not pass values to will have the undefined value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有足夠的參數值傳遞所叫用的指令碼，您不傳遞值的參數會有未定義的值。

trans-unit.source: If you pass too many parameter values, the excess values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您傳遞太多參數值，會忽略的過多的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call script functions in a document from an application by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用文件中呼叫指令碼函式從應用程式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.InvokeScript%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the script functions require parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，指令碼函式需要的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following is the document that implements the script functions that will be called from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 以下是實作將會從呼叫的指令碼函式的文件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] implementation to call the script functions in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 下列示範[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]中的函式呼叫的指令碼實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
The script function does not exist.
Occurs when the document being navigated to has finished downloading.

Navigated event handlers are passed an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> class, which provides contextual information about the navigation, including Web response details.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽的事件處理常式傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>類別，可提供功能，包括 Web 回應的詳細資料的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.
trans-unit.target: 針對最上層巡覽，只會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to the document at the specified <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
The URL to navigate to.
Navigates asynchronously to the document at the specified URL.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%29> method to navigate to a URL that may include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%29>方法，以巡覽至可能包含逸出字元的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> method to navigate to a <xref:System.Uri> that does not include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>方法，以瀏覽至<xref:System.Uri>不包含逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to navigate to.
Navigate asynchronously to the document at the specified <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
Calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> has the same effect as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>已設定相同的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A> is used from markup by developers who want to declaratively specify the initial document that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> navigates to when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A> 從標記使用的開發人員想要以宣告方式指定 初始文件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>巡覽時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%29> method to navigate to a URL that may include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%29>方法，以巡覽至可能包含逸出字元的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> method to navigate to a <xref:System.Uri> that does not include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>方法，以瀏覽至<xref:System.Uri>不包含逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> to navigate to a document by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>瀏覽至文件使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Navigation from an application that is running in partial trust to a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that is not located at the site of origin.
The URL to navigate to.
The name of the frame to display the document's content in.
HTTP POST data to send to the server when the source is requested.
HTTP headers to send to the server when the source is requested.
Navigates asynchronously to the document at the specified URL and specify the target frame to load the document's content into.
Additional HTTP POST data and HTTP headers can be sent to the server as part of the navigation request.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> method to navigate to a URL that may include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以巡覽至可能包含逸出字元的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> method to navigate to a <xref:System.Uri> that does not include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以瀏覽至<xref:System.Uri>不包含逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to navigate to.
The name of the frame to display the document's content in.
HTTP POST data to send to the server when the source is requested.
HTTP headers to send to the server when the source is requested.
Navigate asynchronously to the document at the specified <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> and specify the target frame to load the document's content into.
Additional HTTP POST data and HTTP headers can be sent to the server as part of the navigation request.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> method to navigate to a URL that may include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以巡覽至可能包含逸出字元的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> method to navigate to a <xref:System.Uri> that does not include escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>方法，以瀏覽至<xref:System.Uri>不包含逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a document and open it in a new browser window by specifying the "about:blank" target.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何瀏覽至文件，並在新的瀏覽器視窗中開啟藉由指定 「 關於： 空白"目標。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Navigation from an application that is running in partial trust:
To a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that is not located at the site of origin, or
<paramref name="targetFrameName" /> name is not <see langword="null" /> or empty.
Occurs when the document being navigated to is located and has started downloading.

Navigated event handlers are passed an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> class, which provides contextual information about the navigation, including Web response details.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽的事件處理常式傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>類別，可提供功能，包括 Web 回應的詳細資料的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.
trans-unit.target: 針對最上層巡覽，只會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the content for a document.
Navigate asynchronously to a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the content for a document.
If the `stream` parameter is `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> navigates to a blank document ("about:blank").
trans-unit.target: 如果`stream`參數是`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>巡覽至空白文件 (「 關於： 空白 」)。

trans-unit.source: If the stream parameter is not in a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] format, it will be displayed as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流參數不在有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]格式，就會顯示為純文字。

trans-unit.source: After navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽之後,<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A>將`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a stream that contains a document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何瀏覽至包含文件的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the content for a document.
Navigate asynchronously to a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the content for a document.
If the `text` parameter is `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> navigates to a blank document ("about:blank").
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`參數是`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>巡覽至空白文件 (「 關於： 空白 」)。

trans-unit.source: If the text parameter is not in valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] format, it will be displayed as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字參數不在有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]格式，就會顯示為純文字。

trans-unit.source: After navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽之後,<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.Source%2A>將`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a string that contains a document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何瀏覽至包含文件的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Occurs just before navigation to a document.
Navigating event handlers are passed an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽的事件處理常式傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the navigation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消瀏覽<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.
trans-unit.target: 針對最上層巡覽，只會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is an instance of a <see langword="public" /> class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />也就是的執行個體<see langword="public" />實作，可透過指令碼從裝載的文件的主應用程式類別。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定您要其公用屬性和方法的指令碼使用任何 COM 可見的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讓 COM 可見的類別標示為與<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The object that is set for scripting is exposed to the current document by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] DOM using the `window.external` property.
trans-unit.target: 已設定的指令碼目前的文件所公開的物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]DOM 使用`window.external`屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting" /> is set with an instance of type that is not <see langword="COMVisible" />.
Reloads the current page.
Reloads the current page.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Specifies whether to refresh without cache validation.
Reloads the current page with optional cache validation.
If `noCache` is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control refreshes without cache validation by sending a "Pragma:no-cache" header to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果`noCache`是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>控制重新整理，而且不進行快取驗證傳送"Pragma:no-快取 」 標頭至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current document hosted in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />目前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: Setting the source property causes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> to navigate to the document specified by the <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 設定的來源屬性原因<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>瀏覽至所指定的文件<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Uri> is `null`, a blank document is displayed ("about:blank").
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Uri>是`null`，會顯示空白文件 (「 關於： 空白 」)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to configure <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> to navigate to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by using markup only.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]使用只有標記的文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser" /> instance is no longer valid.
A reference to the underlying native <c>WebBrowser</c> could not be retrieved.
Navigation from an application that is running in partial trust to a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that is not located at the site of origin.
